Articles.Content:
So, does official wiki allows creating pages about mods?

I noticed link to isa mapsat article in another thread.

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/ISA_MapSat

Therefoe, i think that articles for all major mods (and minor) shoudl be created and properly categorized. Many people search for specific mods, like mods containing LES towers, cargo bays or historical crafts. think that woudl be really usefull for community.
Oh well, thanks for link. Althought i still think wikia woudl be better.
